name: Star Maverick
description:
Earth is under attack by the deadly and ferocious Interstellar Horde, and there's only one fighter pilot skilled enough to stop them: Star Maverick! Weave and blast your way through the unending onslaught of Horde fighters and destroy the Horde Mothership before it manages to escape!

Star Maverick boasts many exciting features:

  • Exactly 1 game mode
  • At least 3 sound effects
  • Music
  • Two colours
  • Wait no black and white are shades...
  • Two shades!
